info: Rating, 5 stars,  · 1 week ago,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: Nicely decorated place. Master bed was very comfortable. Helpful and responsive security guard. Short distance to the main areas of Gulshan.

I recently had the pleasure of staying at Sajib ’s place in Gulshan, Dhaka, and it was a fantastic experience! From the moment I arrived, I felt warmly welcomed and well taken care of.
The apartment was clean, modern, and tastefully decorated.The host provided all the necessary amenities, including high-speed Wi-Fi, a fully equipped kitchen, and a washer, which made my stay very convenient. The location in Gulshan was perfect. It’s a safe and upscale area with plenty of restaurants, cafes, and shopping options within walking distance.

Sajib has been a good host. Always accessible and helpful. The place is at the end of a street , so relatively quiet. Bed was comfortable. Check-in process was easy and hussle-free. Daily cleaning service is a bonus.
Only couple of issues, if you use a car, the parking is very difficult. If you dont need to park, no issues. The other thing is - the house needs some maintenance. We experienced some water leakages in two rooms after heavy rain and clogged water in the master bath. We have notified Sajib,. he said he would look into that.
Overall, we were happy with the stay and happy to return here.

info: Rating, 3 stars,  · September 2023,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: Sajib was very responsive, location was good and easy Uber pick up and drop off with friendly local shop across the street. Apartment was spacious and true to photos. Just thought that more towels should have been provided and towels and bed linen did smell a bit musty and a little bit of a general clean and dust would leave this a great 5 star air bnb. Thanks.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · July 2023,  · Stayed a few nights

rating_comment: excellent place, clean, host was very responsive and hospitable.

info: Rating, 4 stars,  · June 2023,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment:
Excellent place and well described luxury. You have all the freedom to be here and comfort guaranteed. Security is helpful and daily staff will clean the house as promised without fail.
Minus is finding the place. Very hard to locate the apartment. But once you find, easy to describe to drivers. Foodpanda has difficulty to locate the house.
Electricity gets cut constantly and tts y minus one star. But its common in Bangladesh. When electricity is cut, generator gets active but operates certain devices only. So there will be no wifi. Better to have sim card from airport. Fortunately i have electricity problem only on the first and second day. After that was fine.
Staffs are great and friendly. They secure our belongings and provide great assist to keep the house clean. Non banglas have translation app as they are not well versed in English.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · June 2023,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment:
I recently had the pleasure of staying at Sajib Bhai's place, and it was a truly enjoyable experience that exceeded my expectations.
First and foremost, the communication with Sajib Bhai was outstanding. He was prompt, responsive, and provided clear instructions on how to reach the property.
Upon arrival, I was greeted warmly by Sajib Bhai's caretaker and given a tour of the place. The accommodation was clean, well-maintained, and beautifully decorated. It felt like a home away from home, with all the necessary amenities provided (apart from the dental Kit). However, during my stay, Sajib Bhai went above and beyond to ensure I had everything I needed.
I highly recommend Sajib Bhai's Airbnb to anyone looking for a pleasant and seamless stay. The combination of a fantastic host, comfortable accommodations, and a great location made my trip truly memorable. I would gladly book this place again in the future and encourage others to do the same.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · April 2023,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment:
It was really great place to stay,house is so clean well organized and comfortable,host Mr.Sajib is so friendly and helpful
We’ll definitely want to visit again
Thanks to Mr.Sajib for his hospitality
